userProperties.name: PipelineActivity
userProperties.value: Deleting all txt files from Azure container

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employees aggregate(groupBy(department),
	TotalNoofEmployees = count(EmpId)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Department join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TotalEmployeesbyDepart'],
	mapColumn(
		DeptName,
		TotalNoofEmployees
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OutputSteam

source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
Employees split(equals(department,1),
	equals(department,2),
	equals(department,3),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ITEmployees, HREmployees, FinanceEmployees, Other)
ConditionalSplit1@ITEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmployees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IT
ConditionalSplit1@HREmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HREmployees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HR
ConditionalSplit1@FinanceEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Finance.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Payroll
ConditionalSplit1@Other sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OtherEmployees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Other

source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		DepID as short,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employees, Department exists(department == DepID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DepartExistsEmployees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmployeesExists

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		DepID as short,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Department
Employees, Department exists(department == DepID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DepartNotExistsEmployees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmployeesExists

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
Employees derive(Country = upper(Country),
		NewCountry = iif(isNull(Country),'Unknown',upper(Country))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CountryUpdat.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DerviedStream

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
Employees filter(equals(department, '1')) ~> FilterOutput
FilterOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmployees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OutputStream

source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpStream
source(output(
		DepID as short,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepartStream
EmpStream, DepartStream join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(input(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDepJoin'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		DeptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
source(output(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
employees, department lookup(department == DepID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['LookupResultEmp.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		DeptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
source(output(
		DepID as string,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
employees aggregate(groupBy(department),
	NumberofEmp = count(EmpId)) ~> Aggregate1
employees, department join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DepartwiseEmpcount.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpJoinDep.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		DeptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees pivot(groupBy(department),
	pivotBy(Country),
	{} = count(EmpId),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PivotOutputEmp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees select(mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		Country,
		Name = EmpName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SelectOutputEmp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Emp
Emp sort(asc(EmpName, true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empnamesorting.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ITEmployees
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HREmployees
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		EmpName as string,
		department as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PayrollEmployees
ITEmployees, HREmployees, PayrollEmployees union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AllEmployees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Output
